publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-296.1 Miss Annabel Goldie: Modernisation of the Scottish Economy—As an amendment to motion (S1M-296) in the name of Henry McLeish, leave out all from "initiatives" to end and insert "improving our education system and our transport infrastructure; and in particular urges the Scottish Executive to promote an expanded enterprise base by encouraging a new culture of risk management in Scotland to enhance the opportunities for new and young entrepreneurs."
